```css
  vertical-align: middle;
}

.generate-btn {
  padding: 4px 12px;
  background: #00d9ff;
  color: #1a1a2e;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.generate-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: #00b8d4;
}

.generate-btn:disabled {
  background: #444;
  color: #666;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  font-weight: normal;
}

/* Generate Rectangle button */
.generate-rect-btn {
  padding: 4px 12px;
  background: #8b5cf6;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.generate-rect-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: #7c3aed;
}

.generate-rect-btn:disabled {
  background: #444;
  color: #666;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  font-weight: normal;
}

.generate-rect-btn.loading {
  background: #666;
  cursor: wait;
}

.generate-rect-btn .spinner {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  border: 2px solid transparent;
  border-top-color: currentColor;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 0.8s linear infinite;
  margin-left: 4px;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

/* Clear Queue button */
.clear-queue-btn {
  padding: 4px 10px;
  background: #6b7280;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.65rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  margin-left: 8px;
}

.clear-queue-btn:hover {
  background: #ef4444;
}

.clear-queue-btn:active {
  background: #dc2626;
}

.hard-refresh-btn {
  padding: 4px 10px;
  background: #3b82f6;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.65rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  margin-left: 8px;
}

.hard-refresh-btn:hover {
  background: #2563eb;
}

.hard-refresh-btn:active {
  background: #1d4ed8;
}

/* Toast notification system */
.toast-container {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 15px;
  right: 15px;
  z-index: 1000;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column-reverse;
  gap: 8px;
  max-width: 320px;
}

.toast {
  padding: 10px 14px;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  animation: slideIn 0.3s ease-out;
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

.toast.success {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #065f46 0%, #047857 100%);
  border: 1px solid #10b981;
  color: #d1fae5;
}

.toast.error {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #7f1d1d 0%, #991b1b 100%);
  border: 1px solid #ef4444;
  color: #fee2e2;
}

.toast.info {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e3a5f 0%, #1e40af 100%);
  border: 1px solid #3b82f6;
  color: #dbeafe;
}

.toast.loading {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #374151 0%, #4b5563 100%);
  border: 1px solid #6b7280;
  color: #e5e7eb;
}

.toast-icon {
  flex-shrink: 0;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.toast-content {
  flex: 1;
}

.toast-title {
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 2px;
}

.toast-message {
  opacity: 0.9;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
}

.toast-close {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: inherit;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.7;
  font-size: 1rem;
  padding: 0;
  line-height: 1;
}

.toast-close:hover {
  opacity: 1;
}

@keyframes slideIn {
  from {
    transform: translateX(100%);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: translateX(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

@keyframes slideOut {
  from {
    transform: translateX(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
  to {
    transform: translateX(100%);
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

.toast.removing {
  animation: slideOut 0.3s ease-in forwards;
}

/* Loading spinner for generate button */
.generate-btn.loading {
  background: #666;
  color: #fff;
  cursor: wait;
}

.generate-btn .spinner {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  border: 2px solid transparent;
  border-top-color: currentColor;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 0.8s linear infinite;
  margin-left: 4px;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

@keyframes spin {
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* Water fix tool styles */
.water-fix-status {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  background: rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1);
  border: 1px solid rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.3);
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: #60a5fa;
  margin-top: 8px;
}

.water-fix-label {
  color: #93c5fd;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.color-swatch {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  border: 2px solid #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), inset 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  background: #333;
}

.color-swatch.has-color {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.color-hex {
  font-family: "SF Mono", "Monaco", "Inconsolata", monospace;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: #93c5fd;
  min-width: 180px;
}

.water-fix-quadrant {
  color: #60a5fa;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
}

.apply-water-fix-btn {
  padding: 4px 12px;
  background: #3b82f6;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  margin-left: auto;
}

.apply-water-fix-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: #2563eb;
}

.apply-water-fix-btn:disabled {
  background: #444;
  color: #666;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  font-weight: normal;
}

.apply-water-fix-btn.loading {
  background: #666;
  cursor: wait;
}

.cancel-water-fix-btn {
  padding: 4px 8px;
  background: #4b5563;
  color: #d1d5db;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.65rem;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.cancel-water-fix-btn:hover {
  background: #6b7280;
}

/* Fix water tool active state */
.tile.fix-water-selectable {
  cursor: crosshair;
}

.tile.fix-water-selectable:hover {
  outline: 2px solid #3b82f6;
  outline-offset: -2px;
}

.tile.water-fix-selected {
  outline: 3px solid #3b82f6;
  outline-offset: -3px;
  z-index: 10;
}

/* Water fill tool styles */
.water-fill-status {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  background: rgba(74, 99, 114, 0.15);
  border: 1px solid rgba(74, 99, 114, 0.4);
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: #7ba3b8;
  margin-top: 8px;
}

.water-fill-label {
  color: #93c5fd;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.water-color-preview {
  background: #4a6372 !important;
}

.water-fill-instruction {
  color: #7ba3b8;
}

.tile.water-fill-selectable {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.tile.water-fill-selectable:hover {
  outline: 2px solid #4a6372;
  outline-offset: -2px;
}

/* Model selector styles */
.model-group {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
}

.model-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  color: #888;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
}

.model-select {
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  border-radius: 3px;
  background: #16213e;
  color: #fff;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  min-width: 140px;
}

.model-select:hover {
  border-color: #00d9ff;
}

.model-select:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #00d9ff;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.2);
}

.model-select option {
  background: #16213e;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 4px;
}

/* Generate with Prompt button */
.generate-prompt-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #9b59b6, #8e44ad);
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.generate-prompt-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a569c0, #9b59b6);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.generate-prompt-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

/* Prompt Dialog */
.dialog-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.dialog-content {
  background: #1a1a2e;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 24px;
  min-width: 400px;
  max-width: 500px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.dialog-content h3 {
  margin: 0 0 12px 0;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 18px;
}

.dialog-description {
  color: #aaa;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin: 0 0 16px 0;
}

.prompt-input {
  width: 100%;
  background: #0f0f1a;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  border-radius: 4px;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 12px;
  resize: vertical;
  font-family: inherit;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.prompt-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #9b59b6;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(155, 89, 182, 0.2);
}

.prompt-input::placeholder {
  color: #666;
}

.dialog-buttons {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.dialog-cancel-btn {
  background: #333;
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: background 0.2s;
}

.dialog-cancel-btn:hover {
  background: #444;
}

.dialog-submit-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #9b59b6, #8e44ad);
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.dialog-submit-btn:hover {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a569c0, #9b59b6);
}

/* Queue Overlays - show pending generations as grouped rectangles */
.queue-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  border: 3px dashed #c084fc;
  border-radius: 4px;
  pointer-events: auto;
  z-index: 20;
  animation: pulse-queue-overlay 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Processing overlay - solid border, different color */
.queue-overlay.processing {
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: #a855f7;
  animation: pulse-processing-overlay 1s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes pulse-queue-overlay {
  0%,
  100% {
    border-color: #c084fc;
    box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(192, 132, 252, 0.3);
  }
  50% {
    border-color: #8b5cf6;
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.5);
  }
}

@keyframes pulse-processing-overlay {
  0%,
  100% {
    border-color: #a855f7;
    box-shadow: 0 0 16px rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.4);
  }
  50% {
    border-color: #c084fc;
    box-shadow: 0 0 24px rgba(192, 132, 252, 0.7);
  }
}

.queue-overlay:hover {
  border-color: #a855f7;
  box-shadow: 0 0 16px rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.6);
}

/* Queue position badge */
.queue-badge {
  position: absolute;
  top: 6px;
  left: 6px;
  min-width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #8b5cf6, #a855f7);
  color: white;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "SF Mono", "Monaco", monospace;
  border-radius: 6px;
  padding: 0 6px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Processing badge - with spinner */
.queue-badge.processing {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981, #059669);
  min-width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
}

/* Spinner animation for processing badge */
.processing-spinner {
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* Model label below badge */
.queue-model-label {
  position: absolute;
  top: 34px;
  left: 6px;
  font-size: 9px;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  background: rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.8);
  padding: 2px 6px;
  border-radius: 3px;
  max-width: calc(100% - 40px);
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* Cancel button - visible on hover */
.queue-cancel-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 6px;
  right: 6px;
  width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: rgba(220, 38, 38, 0.9);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: scale(0.8);
  transition: all 0.15s ease;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

.queue-overlay:hover .queue-cancel-btn {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: scale(1);
}

.queue-cancel-btn:hover {
  background: #dc2626;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.queue-cancel-btn svg {
  width: 14px;
  height: 14px;
}

/* Make grid position relative for overlay positioning */
.grid {
  position: relative;
}

```

Done! I've added the flag feature:

**Backend:**
- Added `ensure_flagged_column_exists()` to migrate existing databases
- Added `/api/flag` endpoint to flag/unflag quadrants

**Frontend:**
- Added "üö© Flag" button in the selection bar
- Flagged tiles show a üö© emoji in the top-right corner and an orange border
- Toggle behavior: if any selected tiles are flagged, clicking Flag will unflag them all; otherwise it flags them all
- Updates visually without page reload

**How to use:**
1. Select quadrants with the Select tool
2. Click "üö© Flag" to flag them (or unflag if already flagged)
3. Flagged tiles will show the flag indicator and orange border

---

**User**

OK now things are a bit crowded button-wise - can you split the "generate" etc buttons into two rows in the status bar?

**Cursor**

I'll restructure the selection-status bar into two rows:

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Generated Tiles Viewer</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/static/viewer.css" />
    <style>
      /* Dynamic grid sizing based on template variables */
      .grid {
        grid-template-columns: repeat({{ nx }}, {{ size_px }}px);
        grid-auto-rows: {{ size_px }}px;
      }
      .tile.placeholder {
        min-width: {{ size_px }}px;
        min-height: {{ size_px }}px;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <!-- Config data for JS -->
    <script
      id="app-config"
      type="application/json"
      data-config='{"x": {{ x }}, "y": {{ y }}, "nx": {{ nx }}, "ny": {{ ny }}, "size_px": {{ size_px }}, "models": {{ models_config | safe }}, "default_model_id": "{{ default_model_id }}"}'
    ></script>

    <!-- Toast notification container -->
    <div class="toast-container" id="toastContainer"></div>

    <!-- Fixed toolbar -->
    <div class="toolbar">
      <div class="toolbar-row">
        <div class="controls">
          <label>X: <input type="number" id="x" value="{{ x }}" /></label>
          <label>Y: <input type="number" id="y" value="{{ y }}" /></label>
          <label
            >NX: <input type="number" id="nx" value="{{ nx }}" min="1" max="20"
          /></label>
          <label
            >NY: <input type="number" id="ny" value="{{ ny }}" min="1" max="20"
          /></label>
          <label
            >Size:
            <input type="number" id="sizePx" value="{{ size_px }}" step="32"
          /></label>
          <button onclick="goTo()">Go</button>
          <div class="toggle-group">
            <label
              ><input
                type="checkbox"
                id="showLines"
                {%
                if
                show_lines
                %}checked{%
                endif
                %}
                onchange="toggleLines()"
              />
              Lines</label
            >
            <label
              ><input
                type="checkbox"
                id="showCoords"
                {%
                if
                show_coords
                %}checked{%
                endif
                %}

              Coords</label
            >
            <label

              >
                <path d="M3 3l7.07 16.97 2.51-7.39 7.39-2.51L3 3z"></path>
                <path d="M13 13l6 6"></path>
              </svg>
              Select
            </button>
            <button
              id="fixWaterTool"

            >
              <svg
                width="12"

                stroke-width="2"
              >
                <path d="M12 2.69l5.66 5.66a8 8 0 1 1-11.31 0z"></path>
              </svg>
              Fix Water
            </button>
            <button

            >

              Water Fill

        </div>
        <div class="toolbar-info">

      </div>
      <div class="water-fix-status" id="waterFixStatus" style="display: none">
        <span class="water-fix-label">Target Color:</span>

        <button
          id="cancelWaterFixBtn"
          class="cancel-water-fix-btn"
          onclick="cancelWaterFix()"
        >
          Cancel
        </button>
      </div>
      <div class="water-fill-status" id="waterFillStatus" style="display: none">
        <span class="water-fill-label">Water Fill:</span>
        <span class="color-swatch water-color-preview"></span>
        <span class="water-fill-instruction" id="waterFillInstruction"
          >Click a quadrant to fill with water</span
        >
        <button
          id="cancelWaterFillBtn"
          class="cancel-water-fix-btn"
          onclick="cancelWaterFill()"
        >
          Cancel
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div
      class="grid-container {% if show_lines %}show-lines{% endif %} {% if show_coords %}show-coords{% endif %}"
      id="gridContainer"
    >
      <div class="grid">
        {% for dy in range(ny) %} {% for dx in range(nx) %} {% set qx = x + dx
        %} {% set qy = y + dy %} {% set has_gen = tiles.get((dx, dy), False) %}
        {% set is_flagged = flagged_tiles.get((dx, dy), False) %}
        <div
          class="tile {% if not has_gen %}placeholder{% endif %}{% if is_flagged %} flagged{% endif %}"
          data-coords="{{ qx }},{{ qy }}"
          data-flagged="{{ 'true' if is_flagged else 'false' }}"
        >
          <span class="coords">({{ qx }}, {{ qy }})</span>
          {% if has_gen %}
          <img
            src="/tile/{{ qx }}/{{ qy }}?render={{ '1' if show_render else '0' }}"
            alt="Tile {{ qx }},{{ qy }}"
          />
          {% endif %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %} {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Prompt Dialog -->
    <div id="promptDialog" class="dialog-overlay" style="display: none">
      <div class="dialog-content">
        <h3>Generate with Prompt</h3>
        <p class="dialog-description">
          Add additional instructions for the generation:
        </p>
        <textarea
          id="promptInput"
          class="prompt-input"
          placeholder="e.g., 'Add more trees' or 'Make the water darker'"
          rows="3"
        ></textarea>
        <div class="dialog-buttons">
          <button class="dialog-cancel-btn" onclick="hidePromptDialog()">
            Cancel
          </button>
          <button class="dialog-submit-btn" onclick="submitPromptGeneration()">
            Generate
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <script src="/static/viewer.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>

```

```css
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.dialog-content {
  background: #1a1a2e;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 24px;
  min-width: 400px;
  max-width: 500px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.dialog-content h3 {
  margin: 0 0 12px 0;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 18px;
}

.dialog-description {
  color: #aaa;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin: 0 0 16px 0;
}

.prompt-input {
  width: 100%;
  background: #0f0f1a;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  border-radius: 4px;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 12px;
  resize: vertical;
  font-family: inherit;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.prompt-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #9b59b6;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(155, 89, 182, 0.2);
}

.prompt-input::placeholder {
  color: #666;
}

.dialog-buttons {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.dialog-cancel-btn {
  background: #333;
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: background 0.2s;
}

.dialog-cancel-btn:hover {
  background: #444;
}

.dialog-submit-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #9b59b6, #8e44ad);
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.dialog-submit-btn:hover {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a569c0, #9b59b6);
}

/* Queue Overlays - show pending generations as grouped rectangles */
.queue-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  border: 3px dashed #c084fc;
  border-radius: 4px;
  pointer-events: auto;
  z-index: 20;
  animation: pulse-queue-overlay 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Processing overlay - solid border, different color */
.queue-overlay.processing {
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: #a855f7;
  animation: pulse-processing-overlay 1s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes pulse-queue-overlay {
  0%,
  100% {
    border-color: #c084fc;
    box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(192, 132, 252, 0.3);
  }
  50% {
    border-color: #8b5cf6;
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.5);
  }
}

@keyframes pulse-processing-overlay {
  0%,
  100% {
    border-color: #a855f7;
    box-shadow: 0 0 16px rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.4);
  }
  50% {
    border-color: #c084fc;
    box-shadow: 0 0 24px rgba(192, 132, 252, 0.7);
  }
}

.queue-overlay:hover {
  border-color: #a855f7;
  box-shadow: 0 0 16px rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.6);
}

/* Queue position badge */
.queue-badge {
  position: absolute;
  top: 6px;
  left: 6px;
  min-width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #8b5cf6, #a855f7);
  color: white;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "SF Mono", "Monaco", monospace;
  border-radius: 6px;
  padding: 0 6px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Processing badge - with spinner */
.queue-badge.processing {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981, #059669);
  min-width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
}

/* Spinner animation for processing badge */
.processing-spinner {
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* Model label below badge */
.queue-model-label {
  position: absolute;
  top: 34px;
  left: 6px;
  font-size: 9px;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  background: rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.8);
  padding: 2px 6px;
  border-radius: 3px;
  max-width: calc(100% - 40px);
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* Cancel button - visible on hover */
.queue-cancel-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 6px;
  right: 6px;
  width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: rgba(220, 38, 38, 0.9);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: scale(0.8);
  transition: all 0.15s ease;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

.queue-overlay:hover .queue-cancel-btn {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: scale(1);
}

.queue-cancel-btn:hover {
  background: #dc2626;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.queue-cancel-btn svg {
  width: 14px;
  height: 14px;
}

/* Make grid position relative for overlay positioning */
.grid {
  position: relative;
}

```

Done! The selection status bar is now split into two rows:

- **Row 1**: Status text + selection buttons (Deselect All, Delete, Flag)
- **Row 2**: Action buttons (Render, Generate, + Prompt, Generate Rectangle, Clear Queue, Refresh)

The rows are separated by a subtle border line that adapts to the current state (empty, selected, or generating).

```css
  border: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  margin-left: auto;
}

.apply-water-fix-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: #2563eb;
}

.apply-water-fix-btn:disabled {
  background: #444;
  color: #666;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  font-weight: normal;
}

.apply-water-fix-btn.loading {
  background: #666;
  cursor: wait;
}

.cancel-water-fix-btn {
  padding: 4px 8px;
  background: #4b5563;
  color: #d1d5db;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.65rem;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.cancel-water-fix-btn:hover {
  background: #6b7280;
}

/* Fix water tool active state */
.tile.fix-water-selectable {
  cursor: crosshair;
}

.tile.fix-water-selectable:hover {
  outline: 2px solid #3b82f6;
  outline-offset: -2px;
}

.tile.water-fix-selected {
  outline: 3px solid #3b82f6;
  outline-offset: -3px;
  z-index: 10;
}

/* Water fill tool styles */
.water-fill-status {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  background: rgba(74, 99, 114, 0.15);
  border: 1px solid rgba(74, 99, 114, 0.4);
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: #7ba3b8;
  margin-top: 8px;
}

.water-fill-label {
  color: #93c5fd;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.water-color-preview {
  background: #4a6372 !important;
}

.water-fill-instruction {
  color: #7ba3b8;
}

.tile.water-fill-selectable {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.tile.water-fill-selectable:hover {
  outline: 2px solid #4a6372;
  outline-offset: -2px;
}

/* Model selector styles */
.model-group {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
}

.model-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  color: #888;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
}

.model-select {
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  border-radius: 3px;
  background: #16213e;
  color: #fff;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  min-width: 140px;
}

.model-select:hover {
  border-color: #00d9ff;
}

.model-select:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #00d9ff;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.2);
}

.model-select option {
  background: #16213e;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 4px;
}

/* Generate with Prompt button */
.generate-prompt-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #9b59b6, #8e44ad);
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.generate-prompt-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a569c0, #9b59b6);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.generate-prompt-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

/* Prompt Dialog */
.dialog-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.dialog-content {
  background: #1a1a2e;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 24px;
  min-width: 400px;
  max-width: 500px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.dialog-content h3 {
  margin: 0 0 12px 0;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 18px;
}

.dialog-description {
  color: #aaa;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin: 0 0 16px 0;
}

.prompt-input {
  width: 100%;
  background: #0f0f1a;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  border-radius: 4px;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 12px;
  resize: vertical;
  font-family: inherit;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.prompt-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #9b59b6;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(155, 89, 182, 0.2);
}

.prompt-input::placeholder {
  color: #666;
}

.dialog-buttons {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.dialog-cancel-btn {
  background: #333;
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: background 0.2s;
}

.dialog-cancel-btn:hover {
  background: #444;
}

.dialog-submit-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #9b59b6, #8e44ad);
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.dialog-submit-btn:hover {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a569c0, #9b59b6);
}

/* Queue Overlays - show pending generations as grouped rectangles */
.queue-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  border: 3px dashed #c084fc;
  border-radius: 4px;
  pointer-events: auto;
  z-index: 20;
  animation: pulse-queue-overlay 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Processing overlay - solid border, different color */
.queue-overlay.processing {
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: #a855f7;
  animation: pulse-processing-overlay 1s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes pulse-queue-overlay {
  0%,
  100% {
    border-color: #c084fc;
    box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(192, 132, 252, 0.3);
  }
  50% {
    border-color: #8b5cf6;
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.5);
  }
}

@keyframes pulse-processing-overlay {
  0%,
  100% {
    border-color: #a855f7;
    box-shadow: 0 0 16px rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.4);
  }
  50% {
    border-color: #c084fc;
    box-shadow: 0 0 24px rgba(192, 132, 252, 0.7);
  }
}

.queue-overlay:hover {
  border-color: #a855f7;
  box-shadow: 0 0 16px rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.6);
}

/* Queue position badge */
.queue-badge {
  position: absolute;
  top: 6px;
  left: 6px;
  min-width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #8b5cf6, #a855f7);
  color: white;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "SF Mono", "Monaco", monospace;
  border-radius: 6px;
  padding: 0 6px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Processing badge - with spinner */
.queue-badge.processing {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981, #059669);
  min-width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
}

/* Spinner animation for processing badge */
.processing-spinner {
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* Model label below badge */
.queue-model-label {
  position: absolute;
  top: 34px;
  left: 6px;
  font-size: 9px;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  background: rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.8);
  padding: 2px 6px;
  border-radius: 3px;
  max-width: calc(100% - 40px);
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* Cancel button - visible on hover */
.queue-cancel-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 6px;
  right: 6px;
  width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: rgba(220, 38, 38, 0.9);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: scale(0.8);
  transition: all 0.15s ease;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

.queue-overlay:hover .queue-cancel-btn {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: scale(1);
}

.queue-cancel-btn:hover {
  background: #dc2626;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.queue-cancel-btn svg {
  width: 14px;
  height: 14px;
}

/* Make grid position relative for overlay positioning */
.grid {
  position: relative;
}

```

Done! The action buttons in the second row are now right-aligned.
